availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Jane Talbot Beall in Bourbon County, Kentucky, in August 1836. Father of Daniel Beall, Margaret Beall, Mary C. Beall, Leonidas T. Beall, Harry C. Beall, Martha J. Beall, John M. Beall, Newton Beall, Samuel Beall, William Beall, and Laura Beall. Farmer in Bourbon County in 1850. Owned ten enslaved persons in Bourbon County in 1850. Farmer in Bourbon County in 1860. Owned sixteen enslaved persons in Bourbon County in 1860.
